imdb.plot outline: These women come from all walks of life. By day they're schoolteachers, office workers and firewomen but by night they are Grievous Bodily Charm, Flamin Aggro and Goregasm. Amazingly all these roller girls somehow find time to fit their everyday life into their roller derby life. It's the players that are championing roller derby and the London scene is the epicenter of the sport in the UK with the London Rollergirls league first championing the sport in 2006. The series looks at how roller girls rebellious alter egos and love for the sport fits into their everyday life, career and relationships by following the girls as they live, play and party.
imdb.title: Roller Derby Till I Die
akas: Roller Derby Till I Die (United Kingdom)
plot: _Roller Derby Till I Die_ (qv) is a 13 part television series following the on and off track lives of the London Rollergirls, a United Kingdom based Roller Derby team.

These women come from all walks of life. By day they're schoolteachers, office workers and firewomen but by night they are Grievous Bodily Charm, Flamin Aggro and Goregasm. Amazingly all these roller girls somehow find time to fit their everyday life into their roller derby life. It's the players that are championing roller derby and the London scene is the epicenter of the sport in the UK with the London Rollergirls league first championing the sport in 2006. The series looks at how roller girls rebellious alter egos and love for the sport fits into their everyday life, career and relationships by following the girls as they live, play and party.
